column5: Hey tks TJ for putting up in the news section about Pro Bass Canada  Those wanting to enter a draw for a boat please visit the news section and go to the site and register  18-19 years ago,Pro Bass Canada was the organization that aided me in founding the MCI chapter in Montreal. They have been in existence for 23 years "why want to be the 1 when you are the 1"  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=31714
thanks for the info I always forget to look in the news section
Thank you for the heads up.  Right now one can only dream, I miss my old boat and a new one is not in the picture righjt now for a long time so this would be a true bonus. AH  FLEX
Thanks Marc by boy wants a boat of his own .One never knows luck can come our way.
